title: The Hobbit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: A fantasy adventure about a hobbit named Bilbo who joins a quest to reclaim a lost dwarf kingdom.

author: George Orwell
description: A chilling dystopian novel about total surveillance and control by a totalitarian regime.

title: Good Omens
author: Neil Gaiman & Terry Pratchett
description: An angel and a demon team up to prevent the apocalypse in this witty and humorous tale.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A powerful novel about racial injustice in the Deep South, seen through the eyes of a child.

title: The Martian
author: Andy Weir
description: A stranded astronaut uses his engineering skills to survive on Mars in this smart, thrilling novel.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: A timeless romance that explores love, pride, and social standing in 19th-century England.
